mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO flow_log (flow_id, work_order_no, sub_id, sub_type, link_code, operate_code, make_by, um_num, make_time, remarks, opinion, to_department, to_reason, attachment_flag, status, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time) VALUES
( #{flowLog.flowId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.workOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.subType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.linkCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.operateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.makeBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.umNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.makeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flowLog.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.opinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.toDepartment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.toReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.attachmentFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flowLog.updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowLog.updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
